topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54fbe30e6368723cc5700700#post_54fbe30e6368723cc5700700
There was a bit in Avengers Assemble. Hulk had retrograde amnesia [spoiler]after Thor smacked him to Earth from the moon woth Mjoln√Ør[/spoiler] and they had to retrace his steps. Apparently Hulk goes bowling with The Thing ever Thursday. He routinely has hot dogs with Spidey. And he's apparently BFFs with an Asgardian crafter named Glorian. Glorian being the dude who makes all of Hulk's teeny tiny glass figurines.
